website_summaries.verdict: Personify that present no one wants with this festively ugly sweater.
pros: Perfect for a white elephant gift exchange party
Bright colors and a shiny bow will stand out in a crowd
Comfortable, soft fabric that resists shrinking
cons: One of the more expensive choices
Might be too warm in a crowded party

customer_reviews.title: it's roomy and I love the length
customer_reviews.text: This sweater was meant to be used for an ugly sweater contest but it was too damn cute so much that it didn't win. This is a men's medium. it's roomy and I love the length.
customer_reviews.author: Inniac Yaj

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 18 in women. I brought the mens cut size x- large. It was cheaper then the womens and the fit was perfect. The sweater is good quality and I recieved so many compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: Perfect cozy ugly sweater! Arrived early, fits great. I got the XXL and it's still fairly roomy, which I wasn't sure I would get but I'm glad I did. Thank you Ryan Reynolds. Thank you Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: 221B7437

customer_reviews.title: ⭐⭐
customer_reviews.text: It is a cute holiday shirt, but I guess I wasn't one of the lucky ones to get the elbow stitching and the gold tie that goes all the way around 😥 I got a xl and I wear a 2x in women so the fit is good.
customer_reviews.author: Kesh

customer_reviews.title: The Elves were a little too Tipsy when making this one.
customer_reviews.text: This sweater is not as shown in the photo! Very disappoiting...the concept is so awesome but the execution is lacking!!! This is a very poorly made sweater with multiple flaws (ref. Photos). Unfortunately, too expensive for what was "present". (pun intended) The get 2 stars for the concept only.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality Sweater You Can Win With
customer_reviews.text: I won my office's Ugly Christmas Sweater Contest with this. I also wore out on Christmas and it definitely gets attention! It is a heavyweight sweater though so you'd want it to be cold when you wear it. I'm 6'3, 195 lbs and the large fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: unoimd1

customer_reviews.title: Great ugly sweater looks wise, but poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Great ugly sweater looks wise, but poor quality. Bought this for my husband for our annual ugly sweater party. He wore it for about 4 hours, just standing and sitting, and the gold stitching around both elbow patches totally frayed and is coming apart. Also, the to/from tag doesn't stay put in the holder. When you move your arms, etc, the tag itself rides up and out of the holder. For the price, it should be better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sweater!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, true to size (I ordered an XXL), and very appealing & eye-catching.
customer_reviews.author: R. Borow

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this sweater for my husband and we love it!! Thick, superb quality. Would purchase from again and definitely recommend this seller, top quality, truly impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Yogi

customer_reviews.title: Too cute to be "ugly" LOL
customer_reviews.text: I wanted an "ugly sweater" and I was actually disappointed. To be honest, it's not as "ugly" as I had hoped. This fit perfectly. The construction is excellent, and it actually looks better in person than online. Quality sweater. I love it, but yeah.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Love this sweater
customer_reviews.text: I love my sweater! And I bought a men’s size so it would be a little bigger and longer.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Bow ripped off first time wearing
customer_reviews.text: The bow ripped off within the first hour of wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: Hayden Corbin

customer_reviews.title: Quality is lacking for price
customer_reviews.text: Quality was not what I was expecting for the price. There were a lot of loose threads and the bow came off on one side after just one wear.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Rustle

customer_reviews.title: The best sweaters! One of a kind and no one ...
customer_reviews.text: The best sweaters! One of a kind and no one else will have it! Just very thick so it gets hot! Lol
customer_reviews.author: JC90

customer_reviews.title: Great shirt, everyone loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Lots of compliments on the shirt. Great quality. I just wish it was machine washable
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Yep!  It's UGLY!  🤠
customer_reviews.text: I can't decide what I like best about this sweater, the bow or the card slot just below the left shoulder. The card comes out and you can address it to the oerson you're giving the sweater to. Awesome gift!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: This sweater is horrible...which is exactly the point.
customer_reviews.text: When people in my office said things like, "It's so bad I can't even look at you" and "That thing is just awful," I knew I had a winner on my hands. This thing is so wonderfully ugly it's incredible. Much to my wife's dismay, it's well made and should last for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Marc J Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Love it 😊
customer_reviews.text: Very nice my bow came off but other than that nice quality
customer_reviews.author: Terra Rollins

customer_reviews.title: Ugly. Great. Missing elbow details
customer_reviews.text: This sweater came and will be great for my ugly christmas sweater party... however it is missing the elbow details. The sleeves are solid green. Heads up for anyone that is expecting the extra ugliness!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew A Henry

customer_reviews.title: The Ugly Christmas Sweater
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this sweater! I ordered this for my company's ugly Christmas Sweater social and I received great compliments and it certainly was a hit at the event. Thank you so much for this amazing item!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did come a bit small but not bad at all
customer_reviews.text: Did come a bit small but not bad at all. Everyone got a kick out of the sweater and it is comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best ugly sweater
customer_reviews.text: Everyone loved the sweater. Won 2 ugly sweater contest. Only problem, how to top it next year.
customer_reviews.author: Walter

customer_reviews.title: Service was good. Ordered this sweater last minute for an ugly ...
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was fast. Service was good. Ordered this sweater last minute for an ugly sweater contest. Unfortunately I didn't win because everyone thought the sweater was cute.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No regrets
customer_reviews.text: If you’re looking to buy this because of Ryan Reynolds, you won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: God awful sweater (in a good way)
customer_reviews.text: Won my office ugly Christmas sweater contest with this beauty. Seems well made. Would buy this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: dmbrox

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Everyone loved the sweater but the bow fell off 2 minutes into wearing it
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Great for an ugly sweater contest.
customer_reviews.text: Very ugly sweater (in a good way) and I won the ugly sweater contest I bought it for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: True to size
customer_reviews.text: The material is thick and so comfy! Better than I expected! My sweater was a bit with everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Francine

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Shirt
customer_reviews.text: The bow fell off very easily and didn’t even last a whole night.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Guerra

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Totally fun to wear. Very well made. Great details we received many laughs and compliments
customer_reviews.author: Nancy N.

customer_reviews.title: Good but not as per pictures
customer_reviews.text: My sweater did not have the bow at back or the elbow design.
customer_reviews.author: DC50

customer_reviews.title: Great and comfortable but slightly itchy.
customer_reviews.text: These were a hit. My SO left his purchase tag on his and we went as a gift and “regift”
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Willis

customer_reviews.title: the fabric is nice, not scratchy
customer_reviews.text: It's just as awful as I hoped it would be, the fabric is nice, not scratchy, the stitching seems solid everywhere except the tiny ones that keep the bow from drooping, but I'm not too concerned about these. I ordered a size up for a baggy look and I love it. Can't wait to wear it out! Oh and also the elbow patches are a blue velvet type material, didn't know that originally, but it's a nice surprise!
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Great sweater!
customer_reviews.text: Great sweater!! So excited to wear it....as soon as I pulled it out the box it made me smile and when I tried it on it was perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great, festive sweater
customer_reviews.text: I love this! Fits and looks great on. Shipping was quick and secure.
customer_reviews.author: Clyde

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a party it was way too small and very heavy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Greater Christmas Sweater
customer_reviews.text: I Love the sweater. I've been ordering stuff online and everything has been small. The size of things are not true to size, but your sweater is a TRUE men's Large.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Customer

customer_reviews.title: Won the prize!
customer_reviews.text: People couldn’t take their eyes off this sweater. It won the ugly Christmas sweater contest by a landslide. M is true to size. Well constructed.
customer_reviews.author: Jim C

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: Thank you, fits great, true to size, and I won the most ugliest Christmas sweater, 5 star
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is such a gorgeous well made sweater. Unfortunately it was small for the person I bought it for.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and yes --- it is one Ugly Sweater
customer_reviews.text: Actually made really well. Very nice and yes --- it is one Ugly Sweater.
customer_reviews.author: W & T

customer_reviews.title: Fit as expected. VERY warm... hard ...
customer_reviews.text: Fit as expected. VERY warm... hard to wear for long as it's quite heavy... otherwise performed as desired!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... fit small so i ordered a XXL which was like a XL
customer_reviews.text: I was exoecting it to fit small so i ordered a XXL which was like a XL. That fit perfect. Won my Ugly Sweater contest with it!!
customer_reviews.author: Vittorio Spadea

customer_reviews.title: Tipsy elves ugly Christmas sweater
customer_reviews.text: Was a great sweater. Sizing is a little on the snug side. Overall very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected for the price
customer_reviews.text: This was made of decent quality, thick, heavy, nice stitching. I was expecting a cheap knock-off, but was surprised when my sweater showed up. It’s actually really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Brendan Swan

product_meta.title: Tipsy Elves Men's Ugly Christmas Sweater - Funny Green Sweater
product_meta.description: This Tipsy Elves Christmas Present ugly Christmas sweater features high quality construction that is built to last. Be sure to check out the matching women's Xmas present ugly sweater also sold right here on Amazon!
feature_bullets: ****Christmas Flash Sale! Price Drop Valid Today Only!**** Features a real, large, gold bow to show that special someone who their best gift is this holiday season.
Extremely soft and high quality - will not shrink or itch. Our Christmas sweaters are made with high quality double-panel construction with reinforced seams. Machine washable and built to last.
All our products ship within 1-business day and same day when placed before 1pm PST, Guaranteed. 100% Acrylic
See all of Tipsy Elves' Funny Christmas sweaters sold right here on Amazon. Shop over 50 exclusive designs for men and women! All ugly sweaters are brand new.
Tipsy Elves Christmas Sweaters are perfect for your Ugly Christmas Sweater party, holiday pub crawls, the ski cabin, and they always make a great gift!
